Introduction

Karin is a South Korean dancer, rapper, and singer under SAI Entertainment.

Karin was introduced as one of the original members of the trainee group WishGirls under her birth name, Yerin, in the single "Wish For You". She released a solo song, "Ka Ka Ka", on November 1, 2019.

Karin made her debut as a member of the girl group CRAXY on March 2, 2020, with the full-length album "My Universe".
